title: Two new member in the Modul Font Family
content:
You may see our display font as known ["Modul 72 dpi"](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110511/http:/www.antreposhop.com/product/modul-72-dpi-bold). It is a part of [Modul Family.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110511/http:/www.antreposhop.com/category/fonts)

[Modul 300 dpi Base](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110511/http:/www.antreposhop.com/product/modul-300-dpi-font) was created for graduate thesis. This thesis presents font designs which are capable of covering what is demanded by the "digital age" and discusses the issues that need to be considered regarding the applications within this new age.  
It is pixel based vector font, you can use only one font file for high or low resolution design file.

And the [Modul 72 dpi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110511/http:/www.antreposhop.com/product/modul-72-dpi-bold) is a non-readable version of [Modul Family.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110511/http:/www.antreposhop.com/category/fonts)

Now we show the new family members, And the [Modul 72 dpi solid](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110511/http:/www.antreposhop.com/product/modul-72-dpi-solid-font), [Modul 72 dpi line](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110511/http:/www.antreposhop.com/product/modul-72-dpi-line-font), It is available at Antreposhop, just 10 US dollars for each one.
